original_title: 実録！！ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像　２０
overview: This is the 20th installment in a series of 10 episodes of carefully selected horror footage that has been posted! Specializing in the background behind 10 episodes of horror footage, including psychic phenomena recorded on home videos and ghosts caught on surveillance cameras.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 20
